name: Component Pouch
description: Small leather pouch that holds all material components needed to cast spells

name: Arcane Focus
description: Special item that can be used to channel the power of arcane spells

name: Scholar's Pack
description: Contains backpack, a book of lore, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, a little bag of sand, and a small knife

name: Explorer's Pack
description: Contains backpack, a bedroll, a mess kit, a tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations,a waterskin, and a 50ft rope

name: Spellbook
description: A leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells

name: Chainmail
description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

name: Leather Armor
description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil.

name: Dungeoneer's Pack
description: Includes a backpack, a crowbar, a hammer, 10 pitons, 10 torches, a tinderbox, 10 days of rations, a waterskin and 50 feet of rope.
